FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 69th, Racine, Marquette, Halsted, 69th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 69th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Grand
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Grand, Laramie, North Ave., and Central, due to fire department activity near Central/Grand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Grand, Laramie, North Ave., and then resume their normal route on Central, due to fire department activity near Central/Grand.

Allow extra travel time.
